election.tally
Class BallotCounting

java.lang.Object
  election.tally.CountConfiguration
      election.tally.ElectionStatus
          election.tally.AbstractBallotCounting
              election.tally.BallotCounting

public class BallotCounting
extends AbstractBallotCounting

Ballot counting for elections to Dail Eireann - the lower house of the Irish Parliament.
